metadata.title: Home
metadata.description: Welcome to PT. Mitra Sahabat Logistik, your trusted partner in logistics solutions in Indonesia. Explore our services and get a free consultation.

hero.title: Integrated Logistics Solutions
hero.subtitle: We provide comprehensive logistics services with modern technology, extensive distribution network, and commitment to customer satisfaction.

services.title: Comprehensive Logistics Services
services.subtitle: From transportation to warehousing, we provide end-to-end logistics solutions tailored to your business needs.

about.title: Trusted Partner in Logistics Solutions
about.subtitle: PT. Mitra Sahabat Logistik has been established since 2008 with a commitment to providing the best logistics solutions in Indonesia. With over 15+ years of experience, we have served various industries and built a reputation as a reliable and professional logistics partner.

contact.title: Ready to Serve Your Logistics Needs
contact.subtitle: Our expert team is ready to provide consultation and the best solutions for your business logistics needs. Contact us now!
contact.form_subtitle: Get the best offer for your logistics needs
